GSD.description:
ext4: fix null-ptr-deref in ext4_write_info

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.262 by commit 947264e00c46de19a016fd81218118c708fed2f3. For more details please see the references link.
